name: Full Steam Ahead (itch)
description:
Move Left and Right with 'A' and 'D' or arrow keys

Jump with 'Space'

If you hit a spike or patron while holding coal you will drop it and have to go get more. If you hit a spike or patron without coal the engine heat will decrease.

Complete the specified amount of trips with coal before the engine loses all its heat to complete the level.

Collect Tickets to use the power ups

  • Dash
  • Super Jump
  • Restore Coal (can only be used if the player is not already holding coal)

This is my first Game Jam that I am participating in, I apologize for the lack of levels but this was mostly a learning experience for me. The blurry player is because of a camera interpolation bug that I could not figure out in time. I hope you enjoy the game as it is, I will definitely try and improve for the next jam.
